## PromptHelper.clickAny() method

Creates a prompt that resolves when any of the given `GameObject`<!-- -->s are clicked on. An accompanying message must be provided in `options.message` that will be displayed to the prompted player. When resolved, the clicked object will be returned.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clickAny<TObject extends GameObject>(objects: ArrayLike<TObject> | Iterable<TObject>, options: IObjectClickOptions): Promise<TObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  objects | ArrayLike&lt;TObject&gt; \| Iterable&lt;TObject&gt; | The set of objects to be clicked. |
|  options | [IObjectClickOptions](./bge-core.iobjectclickoptions.md) | Options to configure the prompt, including the <code>message</code> text. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;TObject&gt;

A promise that resolves to the clicked object.
